entries.journal_entry_description: The Empire needs raw materials to complete their base in Restuss. They have ordered you to supply them with 250 units of organometallic gas from Deep Space.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: The Empire has ordered you to mine 250 units of organometallic gas in Deep Space.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: You have completed the mission in Deep Space. You should return to Lieutenant Wholding in Restuss and give him the gas.
